```{r, warning = FALSE}
library(DT)
library(fs)
```

```{r}
files2zip <- dir(path("data", "raw"), full.names = TRUE)
zip(zipfile = path("data", "bulk_data"), files = files2zip)
```

```{r}
base = path("data","processed")

base_file = path(base, list.files(base))

dat = read.csv(base_file)
```

```{r, warning = FALSE}
datatable(
  dat, extensions = 'Buttons', options = list(
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    buttons = c('csv', 'excel')
  )
)
```

<a href="/data/bulk_data.zip" download>Download File</a>
